properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID =?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID= ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND MEMBER_USE_YN='Y'
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = ? AND MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_USE_YN= 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_NAME = ? AND MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID= ? AND MEMBER_NAME =? AND MEMBER_EMAIL =? AND MEMBER_USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_SUBSCRIBE = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NAME = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PHONE=? ,MEMBER_EMAIL=? ,MEMBER_MODI_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD =? WHERE MEMBER_PWD =? AND MEMBER_NO=? AND MEMBER_USE_YN='Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO =? AND MEMBER_USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_SUBSCRIBE = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NAME = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
